replies.body: Where do you live? Favourite food? Favourite Fruit? Favourite Colour? Favourite Drink? Favourite Animal? Favourite Avicus map? Opinions on me? Rate Avicus 1-10 based on how much you enjoy it. How did you find Avicus?

replies.body:
1. it has to be the mighty England
2. Itallian 
3. BANANAS 
4. Greeeen 
5. Oreo milkshakes = da best 
6. Cats (dont ask)
7. FISSURA (just for the pure rush or the pure stalemate)
8. PURE epic 3 bar ping lol
9. 9/10 (Because of BLOCKLAG)
10. Hmmm... Im not sure it was ages agoo..
